have-passport-will-travel.Name: Have Passport Will Travel
have-passport-will-travel.description:
Have Passport Will Travel

#Truestory
Have passport, will travel. Where to? Pick a time and place and let's get lost

  • Care Instructions

        

    • Machine wash warm, inside out, with like colors
    • Only non-chlorine bleach
    • Tumble dry low
    • Medium iron
    • Do not iron DESIGN
    • Do not dry clean

  • Product Info

    If you’re looking for a stylish, well-fitting T-shirt, then you’ve come to the right place. With added side seams for a quality fit, unisex sizing, shoulder taping, and 100% combed ringspun cotton, it ranks as a top favorite product. Its 4.2 ounce weight makes it an excellent choice for durability and ease of packing. 

    • 4.2 oz., 100% airlume combed and ringspun cotton, 32 singles
    • Athletic Heather and Black Heather are 90/10 airlume combed and ringspun cotton/polyester 
    • Ash is 99/1 airlume combed and ringspun cotton/polyester
    • Alternate Heather CVC/Blend colors are 52/48 airlume combed and ringspun cotton/polyester 
    • Side seams, retail fit
    • Shoulder to shoulder taping
    • Unisex sizing
    • Tearaway label

    Bella Canvas 3001 Unisex Tee

all-you-need-tote-bag.description:
All You Need Tote Bag

All you need is a passport. To see, do and feel what the world has to offer. Most places we go we need a reusable bag for groceries and more sine plastic is banned. Make shopping cute with this awesome statment tote.
